query:
SELECT 
                platform,
                COUNT(*) as total,
                SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as success,
                SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failed
            FROM publish_jobs
            WHERE status IN ('success', 'failed')
            GROUP BY platform
            ORDER BY total DESC
